question:
you recently attended a meeting at a hotel. When you returned home, you found you had left some important papers at the hotel. 


write a letter to the manager of the hotel. in your letter 
 1- Say where you think left the papers 
2- explain why they are so important
3- tell the manager what you want him to do
text: I am writing this letter in regards to forgotten papers at the hotel during my stay. As you might know, I am Dhruv Goyani, who stayed in your hotel for 2 days.

I returned home yesterday evening. My checkout from the motel room was around 2:30 pm. I would like to inform you that I forgot my property documents in the room. I think I was on a call when I put those paper in the drawer nearby the Television.

Those papers are very crucial because they are my property documents. I have to sell one of my properties in a week and those documents contain information about the place. Those are really important because I have to provide them during my deal.

I would like to request you to collect those legal annals and keep them somewhere in a safe place. I can come and collect those papers if you think that is an appropriate thing. If possible, I would plead with you to courier them to my address which I provided during the check-in.
I hope to hear from you soon.
